ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] About loot order
ygData.msgSnippet: I love when I am grouped with a good effective group and they loot fairly. But that like you said isn t always the case.  Ok first a totally off the subject
ygData.messageBody:
I love when I am grouped with a good effective group and they loot fairly.  
But that like you said isn't always the case.  Ok first a totally off the
subject complaint with grouping...as an enchanter who can mez...don't hit the
mezzed mob!  Ok, had to get that off my chest.  I hate when they do that.  
And I tell them not to and they still do it.  Ok, with the looting.  
Yesterday it was FFA and I was trying to keep haste on tanks and everyone's
breeze going and tashan and languid pace on mob and so there was a lot of
medding going on and I wasn't getting loot.  When I did loot I never got but
a few silver or gold.  The others were looting gems (which I could use ) and
tasarin pages (which I really need) and was offering to buy.  Well I meant to
do a guild tell saying The bad thing about having to med in a group is I miss
out on all the loot.  Well guess what...I did a group tell.  Well then the
main tank started telling me to loot.  She said looting isn't going to take
away that much med time.  And I also started saying hey can I have that
Tasarins because no one else could use them in the group but me.  I like the
alpha loot 2 times no split.  I think it works good if people follow it.  I
hate FFA!

Lena


Recently in some of the groups I've been in, we've had a few problems with
loot order. Often, the tanks will insist on FFA. But since I play the main
healer and am expected to sit and med (only getting up to heal) I get
totally screwed. I never get loot. But then when we try to establish alpha
loot some people complain. They don't care about the casters. All they care
about is getting loot for themselves. These people partake in
"ninja-looting". They loot everything really fast so nobody else gets a
chance. And even when we establish a regular loot order some people will
still loot out of turn.
And then we have times when people say we roll for certain types of loot.
When I first joined a group, this one guy told me it was ffa (and he was a
ninja-looter) but that "bronze" and ore were rolled for. I saw that he
picked up an FS morning star and wanted to roll for it (bc it's an expensive
item). He said no, it was only for bronze, not FS. So later he picked up a
bronze weapon. I said, "ok, let's roll for it". He said, "no, that's only
for bronze armor"...
Has anyone else had this problem?
What do you think is the best and fairest loot order?
Just wondering.
luv,
-Su
ps. alpha loot with 3 loots per turn (per person) works pretty well when
people cooperate.
